InstructionData.Title: Ingot Prefab DB
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Ingot DB Chip # Stores prefab hashes for all ingots in the stack. # Persistent, no updating logic needed.
main: # Reset SP move sp 0
# --- Base Metals --- push -404336834 # Copper push 226410516 # Gold push -1301215609 # Iron push 2134647745 # Lead push -1406385572 # Nickel push -290196476 # Silicon push -929742000 # Silver
# --- Alloys --- push 1058547521 # Constantan push 502280180 # Electrum push -297990285 # Invar push -82508479 # Solder push -654790771 # Steel
# --- Superalloys --- push 412924554 # Astroloy push 1579842814 # Hastelloy push -787796599 # Inconel push -1897868623 # Stellite push 156348098 # Waspaloy
# Idle forever loop: yield j loop
